means: 精炼( refine的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: El Salvador produces 100,000 tons of refined copper annually.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨尔瓦多每年生产10万吨纯铜。

sentence.Network_en: This technique is becoming more refined and more acceptable all the time.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种技术变得越来越完善，越来越受人欢迎。

sentence.Network_en: His speech and manner are refined.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 保护心脏：远离十大坏习惯-英语点津 ... oversize 大于一般的，太大的 refined 精炼的，精制的 blood clot 血块.
花语_互动百科 ... 纯洁（ Purity） 高雅（refined）（ Refined） 虚伪（ Falsehood）.
想起一个独特一些的女生的英文名~_百度知道 ... Apt 聪慧的 Refined 优雅的 Superior 出色的.
取英文名字_百度知道 ... 可爱: Lovable 斯文： Refined 公主： Princess.

list.abs: 常用托福tpo听力词汇整理_天道留学 ... flatten 变平，变调 refinement 精致，精巧 Uranium 铀.
石油英语词汇(R2)|生物化学专业英语词汇 ... refined white wax 精白蜡 refinement 改进；加密；精炼 refiner 炼油工人.
房屋重新贷款(Refinance)通常就是通过重新签订一笔新房屋贷款（在房屋净值足够时，新贷款的金额可大于原贷款所剩贷款本金余额…
考博英语词汇 ... referral n. 工作的分派；治疗安排 refine v. 精练；精制；提纯；精炼 refluent a. 倒流的，回流的.
精字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 精湛〖 masterly〗 精制〖 refine〗 精致〖 finesse〗.

entry.tran: 精炼的；去杂质的；提纯的
entry.def: A refined substance has been made pure by having other substances removed from it.

entry.tran: （人）有礼貌的，有教养的，彬彬有礼的，有品位的
entry.def: If you say that someone is refined, you mean that they are very polite and have good manners and good taste.

example.tran: 举止优雅、衣着考究的女士们

example.ex: His speech and manner are refined.

entry.tran: 经过完善的；经过提升的
entry.def: If you describe a machine or a process as refined, you mean that it has been carefully developed and is therefore very efficient or elegant.

example.ex: This technique is becoming more refined and more acceptable all the time.
example.tran: 这种技术变得越来越完善，越来越受人欢迎。

means.word_mean: 1. used of persons and their behavior; cultivated and genteel;

sentences.sentence: "she was delicate and refined and unused to hardship"

means.word_mean: 3. showing a high degree of refinement and the assurance that comes from wide social experience;

sentences.sentence: "maintained an urbane tone in his letters"

means.word_mean: 6. free from what is tawdry or unbecoming;

sentences.sentence: "she hated to have her neat plans upset"

auth_sentence.content: Her poetry...gained simplicity and directness as she refined it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her poetry...gained simplicity and directness as she refined it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her poetry...gained simplicity and directness as she refined it.

auth_sentence.content: The result is a nocturnal set of refined resonance.
auth_sentence.res_content: The result is a nocturnal set of refined resonance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The result is a nocturnal set of refined resonance.

auth_sentence.content: What remains is a nocturnal set of refined resonance.
auth_sentence.res_content: What remains is a nocturnal set of refined resonance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What remains is a nocturnal set of refined resonance.

means.word_mean: 经过改良的;经过提炼的

sentences.en: Much of the really nutritive material actually was refined out of food.
sentences.cn: 大部分真正有营养价值的物质实际上已从食物中提炼出来。

sentences.en: They had a very refined apparatus.
sentences.cn: 他们有一套非常精良的设备。
